Nikola Joki soaked in the love, felt the vibes and unexpectedly was happy to spend parade day in Denver.
The Finals MVP, for once, allowed himself to live in the moment the past couple of days, show… [+6645 chars]

articles.author: Bill Zimmerman
articles.title: Justin Fields shines on final day of Chicago Bears mandatory minicamp - Windy City Gridiron
articles.description: As the Bears start their 6 week break before training camp, Justin Fields looked sharp in their final practice
articles.content:
The Chicago Bears are officially on vacation.
The team wrapped up their final day of mandatory minicamp on Thursday giving players roughly six weeks off before they need to report back to Halas Hall… [+4243 chars]
